entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 38.
